snippet: President Obama on Monday signed into law a bill raising the government’s borrowing limit, averting a default and delaying the next clash over the nation’s debt until later this year.
abstract: Pres Obama signs into law bill raising government's borrowing limit, averting default and delaying next clash over nation's debt until later in 2013.
lead_paragraph: President Obama on Monday signed into law a bill raising the government’s borrowing limit, averting a default and delaying the next clash over the nation’s debt until later this year.
